power.title: Climber's Claws
power.fluff: Thick claws spring from your hands, allowing you to scale surfaces quickly
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.
Special:You can use this power as part of a short rest. If you do, it lasts for one hour, but immediately ends if you enter combat.

power.title: Combat Surge
power.fluff: As your attack goes awry, you react from the heat of your rage, without pause or thought, reversing your weapon and striking again
power.section: Requirement:You must be raging.
Trigger:You miss with an attack
true Effect:You reroll the triggering attack roll.
Special:If the rerolled attack is still a miss, you regain the use of this power when you take a short rest.

power.title: Cull Weakness
power.fluff: Only the strong survive, and you let your enemies know that you are a survivor as you strike down the weakest among them with ease
power.section: true Effect:You assume the Cull Weakness stance.
true Until the stance ends, you gain combat advantage against bloodied enemies and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against them.

power.title: Indomitable Shift
power.fluff: You pound across the battlefield, leaving no openings as you move, and then draw strength from the numbers arrayed against you
power.section: true Effect:You shift a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Charisma modifier.
true You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier, plus 2 additional temporary hit points for each enemy within 2 squares you can see.
true 1 Level 11:3 + Constitution modifier, and an additional 3.
true 1 Level 21:6 + Constitution modifier, and an additional 4.

power.title: Instinctive Charge
power.fluff: Instinctively aware of danger, you are poised to fight as soon as the battle begins
power.section: Trigger:You roll initiative at the beginning of an encounter
true Effect:You gain the following benefits:
true 1 +5 power bonus to the triggering initiative check.
true 1 +2 power bonus to speed until the end of your first turn.
true 1 +2 power bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of the encounter.

power.title: Laugh It Offf
power.fluff: You laugh at your foe's attack, making even its mightiest effort seem pointless against your boundless endurance
power.section: Trigger:An enemy hits you with an attack
true Effect:You gain the following benefits:
You reduce the triggering attack's damage by an amount equal to one-third your level + your Charisma modifier.
true +2 bonus to the first damage roll you make against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack's damage was reduced to 0, you instead gain a +4 bonus.
true If the triggering attack was a critical hit or bloodied you, you also gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll you make against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Loss of Will
power.fluff: As you turn aside your foe's attack, you stare into its eyes, letting it know in no uncertain terms that the battle is in your favor
power.section: Trigger:An enemy misses you with an attack
true Effect:Until the end of its next turn, the target takes a penalty to all attack rolls against you. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.
true If the target is bloodied and you are not, it also takes a penalty to all attack rolls against your allies. The penalty equals one-half the penalty it has against you.

power.title: Primal Charge
power.fluff: You thunder across the battlefield in a blur of steel and speed
power.section: true Effect:You gain a +1 power bonus to speed until the end of your next turn. This increases to +3 when charging.
true 1 Raging:+2 power bonus, +4 when charging.

power.title: Relentless Surge
power.fluff: With a deep breath, you draw vigor from within yourself
power.section: Effect:You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier + one-half the number of healing surges you have remaining.
1 Level 11:Your Constitution modifier + the number of healing surges you have remaining.
1 Level 21:Your Constitution modifier + twice the number of healing surges you have remaining.

power.title: Run Rampant
power.fluff: With bestial might, you break free and step forward, eager for battle again
power.section: true Effect:You make either an escape attempt or a saving throw against an effect that immobilizes, restrains, or slows you. You gain a bonus to the roll equal to one-half your Strength modifier, unless the effect is one that normally does not end on a save or check.
true If you succeed on the check or saving throw, you can either shift 1 square or move up to one-half your speed.

power.title: Snarling Defiance
power.fluff: Your blood flows, and your response is a feral snarl as you prepare to make the offender pay
power.section: Trigger:You take damage from an attack
true Effect:You take half damage from the triggering attack.
true You gain a +2 bonus to all attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.
true If the triggering attack was a critical hit or bloodied you, you also gain a bonus to all damage rolls against the triggering enemy equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Wilderness Walker
power.fluff: Your skill in traversing the wilderness allows you to bypass hindering effects that would delay others
power.section: Trigger:You start your turn and are immobilized, restrained, or slowed by an effect that a save can end
true Effect:You make a saving throw against one triggering effect.
